definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Experts said the study should prompt countries to reconsider how they classify drugs.
sentences.chinese: 專家稱，這項研究應該促使各國重新考慮藥品的分類。

sentences.english: The description of a nominal taxon when it is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立一個命名分類單元時所做的描述。

sentences.english: Search results are categorized and filtered according to the value of these properties.
sentences.chinese: 將根據這些屬性篩選搜索結果或對其進行分類。

sentences.english: Count data should not be treated they are dichotomous data.
sentences.chinese: 二分類數據不應作計數資料處理。

sentences.english: Psychopathological classifications, which emphasize the mother-child relationships, are essential reference marks.
sentences.chinese: 心理病理學分類，着重於母子關係是必要的參考標準。

sentences.english: Studies on pollen morphology and taxonomy of Lespedeza and its allied genera from NE China.

sentences.english: Stars are also classified by their luminosity under the Morgan-Keenan system.
sentences.chinese: 恆星在MK系統下，也經常根據光度分類。

sentences.english: A grading and styling design of garment pattern pieces is described in a top-down way.

sentences.english: Finally, Taxonomical significance of the pollens of Allium is discussed by author.
sentences.chinese: 文中對花粉資料的分類學意義進行了探討。

sentences.english: Process distillation analysers may be classified under the following headings .

sentences.english: It has the function of weigh-in-motion (WIM) and Automatic Vehicle Classification (AVC) systems.

sentences.english: It is the best to classify the patent document into the technology field. That the patent document is not classified is practicable.

sentences.english: At the conclusion, the inflexion of the narrative perspective was supplemented.
sentences.chinese: 結語，補敘了嚴格的敘事角度分類之外的變音。

sentences.english: However, there are others in this category that are not discussed here.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在這個分類中仍然有其它沒有被討論的。
